easybus.controller module¶

async easybus.controller.get_journeys(from_city: str, to_city: str, date: str) → list[BusJourney]¶

Controller for journey crawling

Parameters:

  • from_city – Departure city

  • to_city – Where to go

  • date – Date string formatted as d.M.Y

Returns:

BaseJourney list (Empty list on error)
